title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Democratizing Whirlpool's Virtual Product Development with AWS (IND331)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 借助 AWS 实现惠而浦虚拟产品开发的民主化 (IND331)
abstract: Discover how Whirlpool leverages AWS to democratize Virtual Product Development and speed up design decisions. By running cloud-based cost and performance simulations, Whirlpool generates training data to build explainable machine learning models with Amazon SageMaker, deployed through a modular front-end on AWS Elastic Beanstalk. These tools empower enterprise-wide stakeholders to quickly explore trade-offs and perform multi-objective optimizations using Genetic Algorithms. This session highlights the journey from siloed tools to a unified cloud ecosystem, enabling faster, smarter product architecture choices and driving measurable improvements in cost, performance, and time-to-market.
abstract_cn: 了解惠而浦如何利用 AWS 实现虚拟产品开发的民主化并加速设计决策。通过运行基于云的成本和性能模拟，惠而浦生成训练数据，使用 Amazon SageMaker 构建可解释的机器学习模型，并通过 AWS Elastic Beanstalk 上的模块化前端进行部署。这些工具使企业范围内的利益相关者能够快速探索权衡方案，并使用遗传算法执行多目标优化。本次会议重点介绍了从孤立工具到统一云生态系统的转变历程，实现了更快、更智能的产品架构选择，并在成本、性能和上市时间方面取得了可衡量的改进。

presenter.name: Saurabh Bahl
presenter.title: Business Development Lead Manufacturing and Industrials
